body:
Open data is data that anyone can access, use and share.

In this module we will explore the meaning behind open data and how open data helps to bring diverse benefits to governments, businesses and civil society.
title: 1. What is open data?

_skills.outcome: Explain the need for open data

body:
Open data has the potential to help grow economies, transform societies and protect the environment.

In this module, we explore how governments, businesses and individuals are using open data to create new value.
title: 2. Unlocking value from open data

_skills.outcome: Describe the benefits of working with open data
Describe successful case studies of using and publishing open data

body:
There are a number of community-based standards and quality marques that can help you assess how usable data is.

In this module we will explore what makes data usable and how standards help increase the usability of data.
title: 3. What makes quality open data

_skills.outcome: Define the benefits of quality open data
Describe two guidelines for open data quality

body: The last decade has seen growing support for transparency and evidence-based policy making in government. This module explores the role of the Open Data Charter in enabling openness in government.
displayTitle: 4. The principals of the Open Data Charter
title: 4. The principals of the Open Data Charter

_skills.outcome: Explain why a charter is needed
List the key principals of the open data charter
Explain how the Open Data Charter has been used in Ukraine

body:
Open data must be relevant, up-to-date and accessible in order to be useful.

In this module we will explore how to make sense of sustainability, why this matters to you and what to look for in sustainable open datasets.
displayTitle: 5. Why should we worry about sustainability?
title: 5. Why should we worry about sustainability?

_skills.outcome: Describe key success factors for open data sustainability
Evaluate sustainability for an open dataset
Describe the importance of organisational change to an open data iniative
Define key aspects of open data leadership
